answers.answer: Don't freak out.  Worrying and stressing will likely make things worse.  Be calm and go through the motions as best you can.  Pay attention to your blood sugar levels.  Eat healthy foods that keep your blood sugar level, and not cycling up and down.  This way you will feel better, stronger and so will the fetus.  You can do this.  You have it in you.  Be strong.

question: I just wanted to put this out there. I AM WORRIED! I was thinking I was done after 2 kids and now at almost 35 and with uncontrolled diabetes, I find myself pregnant with #3.  I'm freaking out because I was not ready, did not plan for this and A1C has been 9.0 for 6 months, if not longer. So worried about birth defects, I'm scared. My first OB appt is in two days. From what I can figure, I'm about 10 weeks. Anyone else out there in the same boat?
title: Unplanned Pregnancy (uncontrolled type 2)
